name: Xenorace
description:
XENORACE is a retro arcade racing game reminiscent of the F-Zero series from the SNES and Gameboy Advance era. It faithfully reproduces the "mode 7" effect seen on these machines.

Looking for a simple and mindlessly fun console style racer putting your reflexes to the test ? You just found it !!

Select your track from a wide choice of different environments.

Pick your vehicle from a roster of 8 futuristic racers. Each one has its own strengths and weaknesses, check them all to find your favorite.

Xenorace has 5 diffculty modes ranging from "Google Car" to "Ace". Lower levels offer some driving assistance : anyone can play ! But higher difficulties can put up quite a challenge...

Play with your keyboard or gamepads (Xbox 360 and generic, limited support for arcade stick is also provided), in first or third person view.

Race your way to the top ranks by boosting, drifting, and taking advantage of shortcuts ... if you can... Don't be too reckless though, as each boost costs you a bit of energy which, if it reaches zero, means "Game Over"...

Avoid the hazards of each tracks and show all these pesky AI (or one of your friends) who is the number one !

Xenorace offers two players mode in vertical or horizontal splitscreen ! Like in the good old days of 16-bits consoles, grab your pads and race !

No gamepads around ? Both players can use the same keyboard !

And if you love Xenorace and want to play it on the go, just get the Android version on Google Play ... :)

Features:

  • Buttersmooth, lightning fast racing action !
  • 14 tracks ... and reverse mode
  • 15 adrenaline pumping music tracks
  • 8 vehicles with different stats
  • 5 difficulty settings : everyone can play
  • Keyboard and Gamepad (Xbox 360 and Generic) support
  • 3 game modes
  • Cockpit or third person view
  • 2 players splitscreen, vertical or horizontal split
  • Use 2 gamepads or share the same keyboard !
  • Optional retro CRT postprocessing fx
  • Level of detail selection for smooth racing on any PC !

Try Xenorace ! The demo is free and includes the 7 first tracks with no limitation.

If you like it, please support ! Xenorace is cheap and DRM free !
